column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: research institution. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix res: <http://www.example.org/researchInstitution#> .res:ResearchInstitution rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Research Institution"@en ;    rdfs:comment "An organization that conducts research."@en .res:hasName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has name"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The name of the research institution."@en ;    rdfs:domain res:ResearchInstitution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .res:hasLocation rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has location"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The location of the research institution."@en ;    rdfs:domain res:ResearchInstitution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .res:hasResearchFocus rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has research focus"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The main field of research at the institution."@en ;    rdfs:domain res:ResearchInstitution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .res:Researcher rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Researcher"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A person who conducts research."@en .res:worksAt rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "works at"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The research institution where the researcher works."@en ;    rdfs:domain res:Researcher ;    rdfs:range res:ResearchInstitution .```In the above Turtle/RDF format, we defined `ResearchInstitution` and `Researcher` as classes, while `hasName`, `hasLocation`, `hasResearchFocus`, and `worksAt` are properties. The `ResearchInstitution` class has the properties `hasName`, `hasLocation`, and `hasResearchFocus`, specifying the name, location, and research focus of the research institution, respectively. Similarly, the `Researcher` interacts with the `ResearchInstitution` class via the `worksAt` property, indicating which research institution the researcher works at.
